name: Kohari Koronoiara
description:
Drag 3 colonial kirituhi in a row to get points. When you hit utu press kati to advance to next board. Ko Victoria, ko Grey, ko Cook, ko Wakefield, ko Volkner, ko Von Tempsky enei moko mokai.

These British Imperial & Colonial thieves and murders are some of the main names responsible for betraying Maori and stealing Aotearoa causing generations of racist disrespect and pain. They never taught this colonial history, instead building monuments and memorials to them on top of Maori sites. This silly, buggy game doesn't come close to answering this issue.
